description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Las Mujeres Españolas, Americanas y Lusitanas, pintadas por sí mismas ... Obra ... redactada por las más notables escritoras hispano-americano-lusitanas, bajo la direccion de la Señora Doña F. Saez de Melgar, é ilustrada con ... láminao dibujadas por D. E. Planas. Tomo primere (y ultimo)" Author: SAEZ, afterwards SAEZ DE MELGAR, Faustina. Contributor: PLANAS, Eusebio. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10007.m.1." Page: 36 Place of Publishing: Barcelona Date of Publishing: 1886 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003220051 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue.
